CD-ROM.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a CD on which large quantities of information can be stored to be used by a computer
CD-ROM.translation[1].definitions[0].def: compact disc read-only memory; a small disk on which large quantities of information can be stored to be used by a computer
CD-ROM.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: A CD-ROM holds something over 600 Mb of data.
The official journal of the EU is available on CD-ROM.
